languages.text: "Пало чудовище неисчислимой плоти, ведь всеразмерности его была противопоставлена сосредоточенная в иглу воля Сирлаэль. Пронзила она насквозь монстра, нанизала сердце и извлекла. И было то сердце черным кристаллом Сэйха, Дарующим Мощь".

"The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."
languages.original_text: "Пало чудовище неисчислимой плоти, ведь всеразмерности его была противопоставлена сосредоточенная в иглу воля Сирлаэль. Пронзила она насквозь монстра, нанизала сердце и извлекла. И было то сердце черным кристаллом Сэйха, Дарующим Мощь".

"The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

languages.text: « La bête immense fut vaincue, car même l'infinité de la créature n'était pas de taille face à la détermination sans faille de Sirlael. Elle transperça le cœur du monstre et le lui arracha. Et cet organe n'était autre que le cristal obscur de Seikha, la Source de puissance ! »
languages.original_text: "The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

traits.locale_text: « La bête immense fut vaincue, car même l'infinité de la créature n'était pas de taille face à la détermination sans faille de Sirlael. Elle transperça le cœur du monstre et le lui arracha. Et cet organe n'était autre que le cristal obscur de Seikha, la Source de puissance ! »

languages.text: “就连血肉会不断再生的怪物，也死在了她的手里，尽管那头怪物有着无穷无尽的生命力，但依然无法与希蕾尔尖锐如针的意志相抗衡。她斩断了那只怪物的躯体，刺穿了它的心脏，把它硬生生地扯了出来。而那颗心脏，便是‘力量之源’西卡水晶。”
languages.original_text: "The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

traits.locale_text: “就连血肉会不断再生的怪物，也死在了她的手里，尽管那头怪物有着无穷无尽的生命力，但依然无法与希蕾尔尖锐如针的意志相抗衡。她斩断了那只怪物的躯体，刺穿了它的心脏，把它硬生生地扯了出来。而那颗心脏，便是‘力量之源’西卡水晶。”

languages.text: 「計り知れぬ肉体を持つ獣は倒れた。無限を思わせるその存在も、サーラエルの研ぎ澄まされた意志の針には敵わなかったのだ。彼女はその獣を貫き、心臓を貫き、もぎ取った。その心臓は〈力の授かり主たるセイカ〉の黒いクリスタルだった」
languages.original_text: "The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

traits.locale_text: 「計り知れぬ肉体を持つ獣は倒れた。無限を思わせるその存在も、サーラエルの研ぎ澄まされた意志の針には敵わなかったのだ。彼女はその獣を貫き、心臓を貫き、もぎ取った。その心臓は〈力の授かり主たるセイカ〉の黒いクリスタルだった」

languages.text: "Die riesige Fleischbestie fiel, da die Unendlichkeit ihres Wesens der Nadel von Sirlaels tiefem Willen nicht gewachsen war. Sie drang in die Bestie ein, durchbohrte ihr Herz und legte es frei. Dieses Herz wurde zum schwarzen Kristall von Seikha, dem Verleiher der Macht."
languages.original_text: "The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

traits.locale_text: "Die riesige Fleischbestie fiel, da die Unendlichkeit ihres Wesens der Nadel von Sirlaels tiefem Willen nicht gewachsen war. Sie drang in die Bestie ein, durchbohrte ihr Herz und legte es frei. Dieses Herz wurde zum schwarzen Kristall von Seikha, dem Verleiher der Macht."

languages.text: «La bestia de carne inconmensurable sucumbió, pues la infinitud de su ser no era rival para la acerada voluntad de Sirlael. Atravesó al monstruo de punta a punta, ensartó su corazón y lo arrancó de su cuerpo. Aquel corazón era el cristal negro de Seikha, la Potestadora».
languages.original_text: "The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

traits.locale_text: «La bestia de carne inconmensurable sucumbió, pues la infinitud de su ser no era rival para la acerada voluntad de Sirlael. Atravesó al monstruo de punta a punta, ensartó su corazón y lo arrancó de su cuerpo. Aquel corazón era el cristal negro de Seikha, la Potestadora».

languages.text: "Vücuduyla akıllara durgunluk veren canavar düştü... Varlığının ebediyeti andıran zerreleri, Sirlael'in yılmaz iradesi karşısında bir hiçti. Canavarın içinden geçip kalbini deşti ve söküp çıkardı. Bu kalp, Güç Bahşeden Seikha'nın kara kristali oldu."
languages.original_text: "The beast of immeasurable flesh fell, for the infinitude of its being was no match for the needle of Sirlael's focused will. She ran the beast through, pierced its heart, and ripped it free. That heart was the black crystal of Seikha, the Bestower of Power."

traits.locale_text: "Vücuduyla akıllara durgunluk veren canavar düştü... Varlığının ebediyeti andıran zerreleri, Sirlael'in yılmaz iradesi karşısında bir hiçti. Canavarın içinden geçip kalbini deşti ve söküp çıkardı. Bu kalp, Güç Bahşeden Seikha'nın kara kristali oldu."
